title: Living Legend
opening: The Nabata Desert. A wasteland of scorching sun and frigid nights. It rejects human life. Any careless enough to enter its embrace is doomed to wander lost. Uther, the marquess of Ostia, spoke of a living legend… Guided by his words, Eliwood heads straight into the desert.

The Nabata Desert. A wasteland of scorching sun and frigid nights. It rejects human life. Any careless enough to enter its embrace is doomed to wander lost. Uther, the marquess of Ostia, spoke of a living legend… Guided by his words, Hector heads straight into the desert.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: ...So hot. I'm...going to die.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Hey, do you want me to carry you on my back?

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Huh?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Why are you looking at me like that?

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Such kindness from you surprised me, Lord Hector. Is this some fever dream?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: What's that supposed to mean? I was concerned that you might collapse again, like the other day.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: You're usually so brusque. It's no wonder he's confused. Don't be shy, Nils. Let him help you out.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Do as you're told, boy!

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Waaa!! Waaaaaaa!!! I'm going to fall! I'm going to fall!!!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...Marquess Ostia said, "Enter the desert and move west. Someone will meet you." ...And yet we've seen no one.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: I wonder if we need to move farther in?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...You might be right.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Here.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: What?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: This heat is taking its toll on you. If you please, take my arm.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I couldn't...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Oh, come now.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...Very well. Forgive me... ......

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Hm? Is something wrong?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...It's strange.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What is?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: All of you treat my brother and me so...normally. Doesn't it bother you? Our powers...our looks... We're different from...people...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Has that been bothering you? What's wrong with being a bit different from other people? When I look at you, I don't see other people. I see Ninian. I see a normal, kindhearted girl.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Do you speak truly?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Mm.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Lord Eliwood.

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: ...I believe someone approaches.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Is it Lord Pent?

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: No, it's a group sent by Uther of Ostia. Hawkeye will find them soon and bring them here. Hmph. Your companion is still searching in the desert.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: He's not having any luck finding what he's after, is he?

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: No, I believe he'll find it before long. ...However, a group of bandits is also moving. They've found Pent and are preparing to attack.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Oh, that's...

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: Are you concerned for his safety?

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: No, Lord Pent can take care of himself. However, if his return here is delayed...

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: Yes?

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Will you take your evening meal without us? I will wait for Lord Pent, but I'm sure you must be hungry.

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: Ha ha ha ha...

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Lord Athos? What is it?

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: ...It's you, Louise. You are a most amusing woman. Since Pent brought you here, I feel I've laughed enough for ten years! You have my gratitude.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Hm? I'm not sure I understand, but I'm pleased to have been of service.

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: Ha ha ha.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: By the way, the visitors are coming from Lycia, aren't they? I wonder what they want.

intro.speaker: Louise
intro.line: Lord Archsage, your coloring... Are you well?

intro.speaker: Athos
intro.line: Once it begins to turn, none can halt the wheel of fate. But as long as there is hope, people continue to try. ...They do not know the despair that awaits...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Um, Lord Eliwood?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Ninian?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Over there... Someone is under attack.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Are you sure?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Ah! That must be him!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Looks like.....a lone man and a crowd of bandits.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Let's help him! I dislike seeing someone facing overwhelming odds!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Hold on, Lyn! I'm going with you!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Hey, you two!

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Where do they get all that energy? Unbelievable.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...What will you do?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Let's go! Have to keep up with one's friends, right?

intro.speaker: Paul
intro.line: Oh, look at this kindly soul, Jasmine! He's waiting all by himself to give us his treasure!

intro.speaker: Jasmine
intro.line: Oho, Paul! I do believe you're right! Such generosity!!

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: ...It's taken me many days to find this. I've worked too hard to hand this over to you thugs.

intro.speaker: Paul
intro.line: So rude... And to think we were going to let you live... We're fragile creatures! You can't trifle with our emotions so! You're a bad man! He's so bad, Jasmine!

intro.speaker: Jasmine
intro.line: Oh, Paul. I know it. I really do. My heart, it is breaking.

intro.speaker: Paul
intro.line: What? You, too, Jasmine?

intro.speaker: Jasmine
intro.line: And you as well, Paul?

intro.speaker: Paul
intro.line: Let's go! We must convince him to reconsider!

intro.speaker: Pent
intro.line: ...I've no wish to hurt you...

battle.speaker: Canas
battle.line: Actually, this is quite fascinating. Mark, the Nabata wasteland is a bit of a paradise to magic adepts. Stories tell of the many magical artifacts lost in these sands. I'll keep my eyes open. Of course, I'll be fighting as well.

battle.speaker: Rath
battle.line: Mark… It’s been a long time. No… I have no other business. Command me as you’ve done in the past.

boss.speaker: Paul
boss.line: I can't believe we lost, Brother... Aaah... It's a tragedy, Jasmine.

boss.speaker: Jasmine
boss.line: I got hit, but it feels gooood... These people are too strong, Paul...

visit.speaker: Fa
visit.line: You know what? I’m watching the house all by myself. Do you know how to do that? You have to sit and be good. So that’s why I’m here. What are all of you guys doing? Are you hunting for treasure, like that other guy? Let me tell you a secret. There’s something good buried near the bones. I know stuff like that.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hawkeye
recruit-talk.line: I'm Hawkeye, defender of this desert.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hawkeye
recruit-talk.line: I will drive out the bandits. Guests need not fight.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Hm! Waaa! Who… Who are you?!?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hawkeye
recruit-talk.line: I’m Hawkeye, defender of this desert.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You’re with them? You’ve got some nerve threatening me!

recruit-talk.speaker: Hawkeye
recruit-talk.line: I will drive the bandits away. Guests need not fight.

battle-talk.speaker: Pent
battle-talk.line: Hello there. Beautiful weather, isn't it?

battle-talk.speaker: Pent
battle-talk.line: Pardon, I'm in the midst of some confusion. I beg your leave.

battle-talk.speaker: Pent
battle-talk.line: Hello there. Beautiful weather, isn’t it?

battle-talk.speaker: Pent
battle-talk.line: Pardon, I’m in the midst of some confusion. I beg your leave.

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: H-Hey! Hold it! Grrr! Don’t leave me here!!!

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: You really helped me out. Thank you.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: We couldn't watch such a lopsided battle. That's all.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: So why have you come to this wasteland?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Well... We were told to come here and meet a "living legend."

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: "Living legend"? Ha ha ha! I see. That's well said.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: But do you know what it means?

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: Yes, I suppose I do. Looks like we share a common destination. Hawkeye! You're here, too.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: That I did. And as I thought, it's spectacular.

end.speaker: Hawkeye
end.line: It's getting dark. Let's go back.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: Yes, let's make haste. Desert nights are treacherous.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I don't mind going with you, but how far do we have to walk? No matter how far we go, there's just more sand... What!?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Hector? Lyndis? Where did those two... Hnh? What in blazes!? I'm... I'm sinking into the sand!
